workshop.controllers.internal.rest

Class ExternalAuthoritiesRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • workshop.controllers.internal.rest.WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<ExternalAuthority>
      • workshop.controllers.internal.rest.ExternalAuthoritiesRestController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkshopRestController<ExternalAuthority>

    @RestController
 @RequestMapping(path="/internal/external-authorities",
                produces="application/hal+json;charset=UTF-8")
 @ExposesResourceFor(value=ExternalAuthority.class)
public class ExternalAuthoritiesRestController
extends WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<ExternalAuthority>

        @DeleteMapping(path="{id}/users/{userId}")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'User\', \'put\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> deleteExternalAuthorityUser(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                   @PathVariable(name="userId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.Long userId)
        Just removes this ExternalAuthority from a given User
        Parameters:
        id - ExternalAuthority.ID to be removed from a User.
        userId - User.ID
        Returns:
        HttpStatus.NO_CONTENT in case of success.

 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'User\', \'post\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> postExternalAuthorityUser(@PathVariable(name="id")

        Receives a new User, sets this ExternalAuthority and persist the User.
        Parameters:
        id - ExternalAuthority.ID to be set to the new User.
